body_html:
it's a little unfortunate that we're relying on the 'unhealthy' machine to notify about its own broken state - ideally it would be more along the lines of "if the machine doesn't prove to some external validator that its healthy, it gets canned from the outside"

but that's only a theoretical concern at this point

body:
it's a little unfortunate that we're relying on the 'unhealthy' machine to notify about its own broken state - ideally it would be more along the lines of "if the machine doesn't prove to some external validator that its healthy, it gets canned from the outside"

but that's only a theoretical concern at this point
